entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lac Raglan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
